oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Western Union Telegram to Mrs. Edwin Streuli
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Western Union; telegraph; communication; Hardy, Arkansas; Memphis; 1920s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Western Union telegram sent July 26, 1927, from Walter Streuli in Hardy, Arkansas, to Mrs. Edwin Streuli in Memphis, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Streuli, Walter
